channel.title: Anti-Dupe
channel.description:
Okay, this is a really big problem on my server. When someone declines a trade when the other person accepts, it dupes items. Idk why it does this, but its giving people way more $ than they need...
Is there any Anti-Dupe systems out there? Or can someone help me stop duping?

item.title: Anti-Dupe
item.dc:creator: @shapaklekas shapaklekas
item.description:
@shapaklekas wrote:

time of rune:

I fixed this thanks guys

HOW?

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Dupe
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Rewrite trading completely, and you won’t have these problems, at least, if you do it the right way.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Dupe
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Yea, this is acually a problem is alot of servers these days. We have leeched so far back from a main 3 server base’s, that we just dont have any knowledge of how to stop it and get rid of it. (or at least most people). I personally set a trade timer. When the friend accepts and you declient, it will check and make sure there has not been a copy made (i personally had to make a handler for this kind of thing but it worked), also i am not intrested in releasing it because it required massive server editing to integrate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti-Dupe
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

If its delta base.

Then you cant really stop them.

The source is full of dupes.

Read full topic
